<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.pdf_generator" name="PDF Generator" version="1.0.0" state="published" type="application" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true"> <description> Tool to generate PDF documents </description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfNameWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfNameWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfPTableWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfPTableWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfPCellWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfPCellWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PhraseWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PhraseWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BaseColorWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.BaseColorWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfBorderDictionaryWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfBorderDictionaryWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ElementWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.ElementWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RectangleWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.RectangleWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="HTMLWorkerWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.HTMLWorkerWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PageSizeWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PageSizeWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DocumentWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.DocumentWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ColumnTextWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.ColumnTextWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FontFamilyWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.FontFamilyWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FontWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.FontWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BaseFontWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.BaseFontWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfPageEventHelperWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfPageEventHelperWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PdfWriterWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.PdfWriterWrapper" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ImageWrapper" class="com.snc.pdf_generator.ImageWrapper" />
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.signaturepad"/> </requires>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Tool to generate PDF documents</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.pdf_generator</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>PDF Generator</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.pdf_generator/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.signaturepad</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.pdf_generator</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
